website_summaries.verdict: Nice length of security cable, considering the low price. Easy-to-use laptop lock system with two keys.
pros: Offers a security cable that's over six feet in length, which should meet the needs of most people
Works with many laptops, as long as they have a security locking slot
Comes with two keys so you have a spare just in case
Very easy to understand and use
cons: Doesn't provide maximum security with its simple key-and-lock design, as key is not uniquely cut

customer_reviews.title: Not for Dell Inspiron 5570
customer_reviews.text: Bought a new Dell Inspiron 5570 and this cable lock. When I tried to install it onto my Dell it did not fit. It is about 1/16" too wide. Turns out Dell now uses a smaller locking port on some, if not all, of their laptops. This is Dells fault, and mine for not researching this issue before hand. Lesson learned. For my model laptop only the Nobel Lock TZ18T or Kensington N17 will work. Hope this helps someone from making the same mistake as I did. Regarding the lock, it is a solid looking and feeling cable and lock. 4 out of 5 stars for not posting some kind of compatibility statement regarding Dell Laptops.
customer_reviews.author: John G.

customer_reviews.title: Buy this one - you're done looking.
customer_reviews.text: This doesn't feel cheap at all. The packaging it came in was Apple quality - someone put a lot of thought into a box for a lock. On security, it does the trick in a very simple, easy to use way. Sure, anyone with a mini bolt cutter could cut right through this, but for deterrence value, it's perfect. The cable length is perfect for locking to a table leg or locking loop (my library has them built in to study carrels). The cable is flexible enough that you can move the computer easily without having to touch the cable, but stiff enough that it doesn't look like you could break it without tools.
customer_reviews.author: J. H.

customer_reviews.title: Solid basic security cable for your laptop
customer_reviews.text: It does exactly what it is supposed to do. There is nothing special to say. I use it so I can keep my work laptop on my desk at work overnight sometimes. But it would work well if you are also going to be at like a Starbucks and need to leave the table a minute to use the restroom and don't have someone to watch your computer on the table. Or if you are at a computer workshop and want to leave your laptop on the table in the room during lunch break.
customer_reviews.author: Rusty Yonkers

customer_reviews.title: Good lock
customer_reviews.text: My work laptop got stollen my first week on the job. I move around from 100s of different sites and constantly work remotely. After my laptop got stollen and I got a replacement, I quickly looked for some added security measures and found this lock online. I bought it and started using it right away. The cord is pretty stiff but it seems super secure. My coworkers call me “bike lock” and I carry around keys for my laptop but jokes on them because with this lock my portable electronic computer isn’t going anywhere and I can spend my time doing better things than filling out police reports.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This product is actually better than I was anticipating
customer_reviews.text: This product is actually better than I was anticipating. It feels sturdy and has good weight to it. I am confident it will be an effective theft deterrent just by its looks and an effective preventative by its quality. I am extremely pleased!.
customer_reviews.author: Devan Winters

customer_reviews.title: works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: This does exactly what it is supposed to do, that is, lock anything with a standard "kensington" opening commonly found on laptops. My only slight concern is that the lock itself is attached to the cable with what appears to be a rivet. The rivet could be chopped off, I believe. But then with the right tool, the cable could be cut as well, so this device is really more of a deterrent than absolute protection against all efforts to break it. I use it to chain my laptop to the table during trade shows, and for such a purpose it is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Colin Barnett

customer_reviews.title: Good lock, good cable.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the lock to secure an office-use lap top. Quality is good, lock is tight, and cable long enough to secure it through a hole in the middle of the kitchen-counter sized desk and out of the hole onto the laptop. Good lock.
customer_reviews.author: MickeyD

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I love these laptop locks. I purchase them for my supervisors and leads at work so that they can feel secure leaving their laptops in the office overnight. They're very sturdy, I've never had issues with the locking mechanisms like I've had with other manufacturers(the lock sometimes goes out of alignment with the key, making it impossible to remove the key after locking up). The presentation of this product is one of my favorite attributes. It doesn't just come in plastic, it comes in a nice little box with a silver/gray sleeve that has the manufacturer's name on it. I would definitely recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: TFran

customer_reviews.title: Great lock, didn't fit my laptop
customer_reviews.text: This appears to be a super lock for the price. Unfortunately for me I believed the Costco description for my Acer Spin 5 that said it has a Kensington lock slot. But no. I has a Noble lock slot. So I ordered one that fits, and rather than return the Ruban I gave it to a friend who has a computer that it will fit. She loves it. Nothing like helping cement a friendship!
customer_reviews.author: Charles L. Vogel

customer_reviews.title: Higher quality than expected for price.
customer_reviews.text: Used this to chain my laptop to the bedframe in my hotel while we went out in London. The mechanism seemed sturdier than I expected. The lock turned smoothly. It felt very well-made. Of course, none of these will help you much when someone is actually trying to steal your stuff; it's more to prevent crimes of opportunity than actual intent. Wouldn't hold up to a wire cutter, I hear.
customer_reviews.author: LiveFromTexas2008

customer_reviews.title: Laptop locks
customer_reviews.text: I like the idea of locks in laptops but this will be a gift to my 2 grandchildren going to college and will be sent out of the country. I like how it looks but cant’ give a review since I will not be using them... will follow up once it is received by my grandchildren.
customer_reviews.author: Bernadette C. Borromeo

customer_reviews.title: Good lock but hit or miss whether it will fit your computer
customer_reviews.text: I like the lock but it does not fit my brand new 2018 Dell XPS 15 laptop. I wish they had a list of what laptops if fit and what laptops it does not fit instead of just a blanket statement that it fits "most laptops". It obviously does not and now I have to go to the hassle of sending it back and trying different model, which is a shame because it is a good lock.
customer_reviews.author: G. Mills

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this system in the past, I was given a different brand and it did not work, was hard to install and seemed very easy to pull out of the laptop. I purchased this cable since I knew that it would work and be more secure for the laptop that is in a public location in our office. I would recommend this product to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: NLGirl

customer_reviews.title: Love this lock
customer_reviews.text: Very good lock. I use this every time I go out in a public place with my computer. I like the fact that it has a key instead of a combination and I like that the cable is not a coil cable. My friend has one with a combination and it is a coil cable. He is always fussing with the coil cable when hooking it up and unhooking it and he has trouble with the combination in dim light like when the place of use is closing up for the night and they turn off some of the lights.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: It's the Best!
customer_reviews.text: It's the nest. Shop no further because this is IT. What an amazing engineering feat! Gives you peace of mind knowing that you have secured your notebook reasonably well. Lock is easy to lock and unlock. Has the look of quality.
customer_reviews.author: MICHAEL HOLTZHAUER

customer_reviews.title: More in depth and correct description on products
customer_reviews.text: Tried so hard to make this work. This was supposed to be a Kensington lock for my Razer Blade 15 but it didn't fit. I had to go to the Kensington web site and found out which lock would work with mine! They were really helpful on me finding the right one. Their are alot of different models out there so even if you are told it's a Kensington slot, doesnt mean it's the right model that fits that slot. Plus this one can scratch around the slot. The one the website told me that was right for mine, has a rubber piece around it so it cant scratch around the slot. Got the right one yesterday and it fits!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: Good value for the money. Materials and built quality is very good. I find the key method quicker and easier to use than trying to see and dial a small combo lock. The dual swivel/hinge mount at the lock allows the cable to lay smoothly in any direction leading away from the laptop. This prevents loops of cable getting in the way of your mouse of related paperwork etc, next to your laptop. I would Buy This Again.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: New to this type off thing.
customer_reviews.text: Lock and cable look very good. Looks like the only way to get the computer is break the computer or break what the cable is connected to. Took me a moment to connect lock on computer. Seeing I have never used anything like this. It is-not difficult to use. Not take much space is needed to store and transport.
customer_reviews.author: Utfam

customer_reviews.title: I even bumped up my rating because for the price it's well worth purchasing.
customer_reviews.text: The item came promptly and works just fine and the extra long cable is a must as far as I'm concerned as that lets me lock up my carry pack along with the laptop. I keep a number of electronic devices in it and knowing that the cable lock will slow some one down or maybe even deter them from taking my things if I have to step away for a second is a comefort. On the down side it could be a little thicker, but for the price its A.O.K. and I mean that sincerely. I even bumped up my rating because for the price it's well worth purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Security of a pop-rivet
customer_reviews.text: I like almost everything. BUT the cable is held to the lock mechanism by a pop-rivet. This is a very obvious weak point. It is true that the lock mechanism for any laptop lock is not all that secure, but the pop-rivet is just so inappropriate.
customer_reviews.author: John & Dawn Moehrke

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Assembly required.
customer_reviews.text: My order arrived on schedule and the item was what I ordered. The lock is great. The instructions were difficult to follow but I was able to assemble the locking mechanism. There's a tiny Allen wrench that isn't shown in the instructions that is essential to the assembly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not so useful, but it's not the product's fault.
customer_reviews.text: As it turns out, the library doesn't like it when I leave my locked laptop on a desk. They want me to take the laptop with me when I use the restroom. Take this into consideration before you buy: will the place where you will most use it want you to use it? It works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel M Bowers

customer_reviews.title: Superb Lock for My Acer Aspire E 15 E5-575-33BM Laptop
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely pleased with my purchased of this RUBAN Notebook Lock. It was exactly as described online and works great in securing my Acer Aspire E 15 E5-575-33BM laptop! The lock was delivered ahead of schedule and I could not be happier with this product and the performance of the Seller!
customer_reviews.author: Norman Eng

customer_reviews.title: Broke my 15" hp pavilion x360
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my 15" hp pavilion x360 but it doesn't fit. I could insert the lock but once I rotated to lock it, the lock was too big and broke my laptop. It seems solid and sturdy though
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately, I couldn't fit it on my laptop, ...
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, I couldn't fit it on my laptop, since the lock opening on my Dell was too small to accommodate anything. However, once I purchased a stick-on security plate, it went on and stayed on.
customer_reviews.author: TheStarvingArtist

customer_reviews.title: it simply works
customer_reviews.text: This works really well to keep co-workers from borrowing a laptop when I'm away. Underneath it is still a plastic laptop so it's not really a deterrent to theft otherwise. It does it's job quite well, and the price is right
customer_reviews.author: JRelyea

customer_reviews.title: Great lock for MSI and Asus gaming laptops
customer_reviews.text: The lock works great with my MSI Apache laptop. It also fits my Asus gaming laptop. It's easy to lock and unlock. Not sure how strong the cable is but having a lock is at least a deterrent against grab and run opportunities.
customer_reviews.author: g2010

customer_reviews.title: Did not work properly
customer_reviews.text: This item is defective. It may be uncommon, I am not sure, but this particular device did not work. The lock would not fully engage when inserted into the laptop. I am returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks attractive.  Lock is easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Used this lock system to secure a laptop in and area that isn't secured during business hours. As with anything these days locks and other security systems are deterrents. They keep honest people honest, they deter temptation of those with a sense of right and wrong. Nothing will protect from a professional thief or someone with no conscience.
customer_reviews.author: Alan V.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use. Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Good strength cable, I use it to secure the laptop in the laptop backpack to furniture in the hotel room while I am away.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Great lock.  Worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: This is a solid little cable lock. The cable is rubber coated so you don't scratch anything and the locking mechanism is solidly built. I know there are $6 options here for cable locks but avoid those. I had one and it was garbage. Spend the extra few bucks and do it right.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I use this when I go out to Starbucks or ...
customer_reviews.text: I use this when I go out to Starbucks or somewhere public, and I don't want to be constantly tied to my seat or unable to do anything without packing up my laptop. Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: BioHacker

customer_reviews.title: Easy and effectiveu
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed to keep my teens from dragging the laptop all over the house. They cannot get the lock off and I can see they have tried.
customer_reviews.author: ariana

customer_reviews.title: Works as intended - use some force
customer_reviews.text: Quality materials and lock. To be inserted, it takes some force and must be inserted fully to lock.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin M

customer_reviews.title: Fits the basic security needs of a laptop user
customer_reviews.text: Seems sturdy at the lock. This will certainly not keep those who REALLY want your laptop from stealing it but it will keep the casual pass and grab from happening.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke & Scott P.

customer_reviews.title: Good price point.
customer_reviews.text: Great value. Secures my Lenovo Thinkpad when I’m away from my desk.
customer_reviews.author: DonPaul Benzaquin

customer_reviews.title: I definitely recommend this item
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this nearly every day for the last 7 or so months and it is holding up very well. Before I purchased this item, I purchased a cheaper laptop lock that was just junk and I had to return it. I definitely recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: E K

customer_reviews.title: Was light and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Use it everyday. Cord was long, but i can velcro it to any size depending on how far away the anchor is. Would recommend. Keep the spare key in my gym locker.
customer_reviews.author: Riitacat

customer_reviews.title: It is easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I received the lock on time. Tried it out and it is in the computer bag waiting to go along on a road trip.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Laptop lock
customer_reviews.text: It does what I need it to do. Secure my laptop to the desk. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: EBL

customer_reviews.title: Good Lock for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Feels secure for a cheap price. I haven't figured out the lock yet but I have locked and unlocked it a few times by just playing with it. Obviously this is merely to deter someone from stealing and there's no guarantees that it couldn't be cut in 30 seconds or have the table stolen with it
customer_reviews.author: James Bond

customer_reviews.title: Good lock. Durable and Affordable
customer_reviews.text: Very good build quality. Easy to lock and unlock as the keys fit good and the lock didn't feel like it was going to fall apart, like some others that I have used.
customer_reviews.author: JP Nunemaker

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to get on and off. Nearly impossible to ...
customer_reviews.text: Difficult to get on and off. Nearly impossible to get key out without being locked. Worth it for a cheap quick fix
customer_reviews.author: LRL

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work for a Mac
customer_reviews.text: Vendor shipped quickly. Item is boxed well. Answered my email very quickly on a Sunday. Unfortunately it doesn't work on my Mac book Pro. May work on other versions
customer_reviews.author: Fort Mama

customer_reviews.title: Secure
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use, lock and cable appear strong, an excellent price.
customer_reviews.author: Booby Marcinkowski

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: it is easy to use and i hope will do the job of protecting my son's laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: It has one job...
customer_reviews.text: ... and it does what it says it will. Now I finally feel protected when I need to step away and use the restroom when working remotely.
customer_reviews.author: thom//h

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t fit in my computer but would recommend otherwise.
customer_reviews.text: Seemed to be good quality, didn’t fit in my computer (hp) but seller was considerate and reached out. Ended up returning it because I couldn’t use it but if it works in your computer, I’d recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Bailey G

customer_reviews.title: All good so far
customer_reviews.text: All good so far. Very cheap compared to Kensington, fits my HP chromebooks where I've had trouble with a couple Kensington locks not being able to lock in place. The hinge feels very lose, had me a little worried about its durability but I couldn't break it so we'll see how it works out in the long run.
customer_reviews.author: Hal

customer_reviews.title: Secure and inconspicuous
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for what it was designed. Better security than most combination locks out there.
customer_reviews.author: Liborio

customer_reviews.title: Good quality lock
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly good quality for an inexpensive lock. Offers mild peace of mind attached to my company laptop. After a few grab and run laptop thefts, this is a welcome addition, saving myself the hassle and red tape should mine be next.
customer_reviews.author: Parabellum

customer_reviews.title: Little laptop lock
customer_reviews.text: Worth the price now i dont have to put the laptop away
customer_reviews.author: Mario

customer_reviews.title: Does what it should and has a nice length.
customer_reviews.text: Does what it should and has a nice length. (I have it "permanently" locked to a table. I am not constantly removing and re-locking it so take that in consideration to my review)
customer_reviews.author: Husband&Dad

customer_reviews.title: The keyed locks are nvery ice also
customer_reviews.text: I own both the RUBAN combination and keyed locks. I am impressed with them both. I don't see too many reviews for the keyed lock on here so I just want people to know that they are very nice also.
customer_reviews.author: J. A. Burns

customer_reviews.title: It was not the correct lock for my laptop. ...
customer_reviews.text: It was not the correct lock for my laptop. This was not the fault of this company. It turns out my XPS13 needs a Noble Lock. This is a Kensington style lock. I did not know there were multiple types.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Ruban Notebook Lock Handles our Security
customer_reviews.text: We first ordered a Ruban Notebook Lock in January 2016 and it does the job of securing a Dell Micro PC to a table. We purchased 3 more for upcoming projects. There is nothing to put together so it's easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Lake Geneva Public Library

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with the order my order cam in just as ...
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the order my order cam in just as they said it would . no problems with order the notebook lock works great would recommend it to any one .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Strong, Secure and Costs Less
customer_reviews.text: The lock and cable materials feel just as stable and secure as the more expensive and well known brand. The keys are not cheap or flimsy and it fit in to any standard Kensington key whole. I've used both the slot on the laptop and on a dock and it worked seamlessly
customer_reviews.author: ZReviews

customer_reviews.title: I like the extra long cable.  6.5 feet, most are 6 feet or smaller.
customer_reviews.text: I like the extra long cable. 6.5 feet, most are 6 feet or smaller. The lock and keys look of very good quality and it seems to fit very well. The key in the lock works nice and smooth. Very happy so far after a week of use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lock and security cable
customer_reviews.text: This is a strong cable. I preferred the key lock better than the combination lock.
customer_reviews.author: JLong

customer_reviews.title: This product makes me feel secure about my merchandise.
customer_reviews.text: I am using this product too secure my laptop and Gaming Consoles.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Jonesjr

customer_reviews.title: Key and lock are not numbered
customer_reviews.text: I like the lock and it does the job. I ordered 15 locks in one order. When installing them for the first time I found that there isn't any type of imprint on the lock and key. I've had to create labels for each to associate them together. for this reason I would not purchase them again.
customer_reviews.author: NEJ

customer_reviews.title: much cheaper than most others I found but as good quality and other twice the price
customer_reviews.text: Solid lock, much cheaper than most others I found but as good quality and other twice the price. DOES seem to work in the new security locks that are present on some Dell Latitude laptops.
customer_reviews.author: Lester E Maas

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t fit Dell Inspiron laptop
customer_reviews.text: Quality is great but it doesn’t fit the DELL Inspiron 17, 7000 series laptop.
customer_reviews.author: sss333

customer_reviews.title: Good security
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cable for use in an office. It appears to be just what we needed to secure a laptop. It was easy to install and not in the way of other items on the desk.
customer_reviews.author: Sun Lover

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for office
customer_reviews.text: Locks and unlocks pretty easily, the length of the cable helps a lot if you have a mid room desk or if you simply want to hide the cable under your desk.
customer_reviews.author: Alessandro

customer_reviews.title: sturdy, the lock features an actual key not a ...
customer_reviews.text: Long enough to go around the most difficult desk, sturdy, the lock features an actual key not a code. Just what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: MJH

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed. Works perfectly.I would recommend this for anyone looking for a laptop lock. Shipped very quickly and easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is an excellent product. I love that it is a key ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this lock to use during travel. It worked perfectly. I was asked multiple times where I purchased the lock. It is an excellent product. I love that it is a key and not combination. I put the key on my regular key ring to make sure I kept up with it.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany V

customer_reviews.title: Solid Cable Lock
customer_reviews.text: Good, reliable heavy duty cable lock for laptop and other hardware. Provides assurance your computer will stay where you left it.
customer_reviews.author: Charles B. Puestow

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great price.
customer_reviews.text: Item came quickly ans works flawlessly. Great seller and product! 5 stars and would buy from again.
customer_reviews.author: I am Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase for dorm.
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Love the fact the connection sort of pivots. Very good for dorm room.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t fit all laptops
customer_reviews.text: Great product but did not fit the Dell Inspiron which I had purchased
customer_reviews.author: beadfan

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Great lock, especially for the price. I ordered it on Thursday and it was delivered on Sunday!
customer_reviews.author: VicD

customer_reviews.title: Does NOT work with Dell XPS laptops!
customer_reviews.text: I asked before purchasing the product if it worked with Dell XPS 15, and I was assured it did. However, it does not fit the lock port on my laptop, so do not buy this if you have the newer versions of Dell XPS!
customer_reviews.author: Andreea V.

customer_reviews.title: Nice look!
customer_reviews.text: Very well packaged. Nice look. Robust and well made. +++++
customer_reviews.author: Gian Maria Niccolò Benucci

customer_reviews.title: Study Protection for your tech.
customer_reviews.text: The product exceeded my expectations for a laptop security lock and cable. Would buy again...
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: I like the swivel head, it makes them easier to fit in cramped situations. Perfect length too.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Vauthrin

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Exactly like a Kensington, but half the price or better. Easy to use. Hold barrel while turning key. That doesn't make much sense here, but you'll figure it out once you get it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey K.

customer_reviews.title: Works Well. Will help deter would be thieves, ...
customer_reviews.text: Works Well. Will help deter would be thieves, but I'm sure if they really want your laptop, they'll find a way.
customer_reviews.author: Isaac Chung

customer_reviews.title: looks nice functions great
customer_reviews.text: great cable easy to use and is about 6 ft? gives peace of mind.
customer_reviews.author: RR

customer_reviews.title: Excepeptional value all the way around
customer_reviews.text: Great low price, high quality, speedy delivery, and superb packaging. You cannot ask for more!
customer_reviews.author: J. R. Mathis

customer_reviews.title: Good cable
customer_reviews.text: Nice security cable. Locks well. Works fine with Levono lap top
customer_reviews.author: Zenelea

customer_reviews.title: Great low price lock
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this locking cable after I had a bad experience with the combination type lock. The cable when attached to the computer is very secure. Just make sure you don't lose the key.
customer_reviews.author: Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Great lock, strong, flexible. Much cheaper then a Kensington but just as good.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Lock
customer_reviews.text: First, let me say that I was impressed with the presentation of this lock! It caught my eye right away and I couldn't wait to open it. Second, and finally, the lock itself was just what I needed and is, by my usage, well made. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Jeffries

customer_reviews.title: Easy to work with key
customer_reviews.text: Lock works very good , easy to put on and off.
customer_reviews.author: hc5760

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Product works great at securing a Dell Vostro laptop in a public space!
customer_reviews.author: Richard A. Tamashiro-Costa

customer_reviews.title: Love IT!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. I feel very secure and safe after purchasing and installing the cable lock on my most recent PC purchase. Thanks!!!
customer_reviews.author: adolide

customer_reviews.title: Ruban notebook lock
customer_reviews.text: This cable works great, I had a cheap one before and the lock broke the first time I used it. I lock it to a table when I'm out so I can use the bathroom without worry.
customer_reviews.author: tpz1957

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and a good price point
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice laptop lock. Excellent quality and a good price point.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Bennett

customer_reviews.title: The RUBAN Notebook Lock and Security Cable works great for my purposes
customer_reviews.text: The RUBAN Notebook Lock and Security Cable works great for my purposes. The shipping was quick, too.
customer_reviews.author: Just another sane, rational Floridian

customer_reviews.title: Great Cable
customer_reviews.text: Great cable. Well made and the lock works great. The cable is very flexible. I would definitely buy this cable again.
customer_reviews.author: Info Tech Analyst

customer_reviews.title: Works good. Not the smoothest lock mechanism
customer_reviews.text: Works good. Not the smoothest lock mechanism, but it does the job.
customer_reviews.author: rickjames8

customer_reviews.title: Fills the need
customer_reviews.text: I needed a simple lock with right angle swivel. The lock and key fit is not smooth and takes a bit playing with to get it locked and unlocked.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great and makes me feel better with my work laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Lock doesn't fit my laptop
customer_reviews.text: Probably not a bad lock for leather/ older laptops but it doesn't fit my Dell Latitude.
customer_reviews.author: Alan L. Kalbfleisch

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use and long enough to hook onto something permanent in a hotel room
customer_reviews.author: Diane Miller

customer_reviews.title: Worked well well made
customer_reviews.text: Used it to secure a NAS in a cabinet. Worked well.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Pennington

customer_reviews.title: Lock that works well
customer_reviews.text: This product allows the laptop to be locked and stores up small enough not to be a problem
customer_reviews.author: Murf

product_meta.title: RUBAN Notebook Lock and Security Cable (PC/Laptop) Two Keys 6.2 foot (Black)
product_meta.description:
Size:6.2 foot

RUBAN Notebook Lock and Security Cable (PC/Laptop) Two Keys 6.2 foot (Black)

Features
- 6.2 Foot Universal Security Cable.
- Cable comes with 2 lock keys as an alternative spare.
- Works with nearly all notebooks, desktops, docking stations with built in standard security locking slot hole.
- If your notebook has a security slot size of 0.28" * 0.12", you can use this product.
- The T-bar mechanism bar allows popular utilization of this lock.
- Protect your notebook computer and its valuable data with this affordable computer lock.

Compatible with:
- Works with most notebooks, desktops

NOT Compatible with:
- [Dell] May not work with 2016 and newer Dell laptops.XPS13/ SPX13/ 7000/ M3800/ Alienware/ Insprion 7000,7779,other Inspiron,Latitude,Venue,XPS with square keyhole.
- [HP] Chromebook 13.
- [Acer] Chromebook R13 /Aspire V Nitro /E571.
- [Apple] New Apple Macbook can't use it. Only old macbook Pro With DVD Drive can be used.
- [Lenovo] U41 / U31 / M41 / S41 / K41 / Ideapad / Flex3 / rescuer r720.

Package Includes:
- Notebook Security Lock*1
- User instructions*1

Warranty:
- 18 months warranty
feature_bullets: 6.2 Foot Universal Security Cable. Made of extremely strong and durable steel cable. Easy to install and theft deterrent.

Cable comes with 2 lock keys as an alternative spare. Available for most notebooks,laptops,desktops with built in standard security locking slot hole.If your notebook has a security slot size of 0.28" * 0.12", you can use this product.

Note:The following model can't be used. [Dell] May not work with 2016 and newer Dell laptops.XPS13/ SPX13/ 7000/ M3800/ Alienware/ Insprion 7000,7779,other Inspiron,Latitude,Venue,XPS with square keyhole.[HP] Chromebook 13.[Acer] Chromebook R13 /Aspire V Nitro /E571.[Apple] New Apple Macbook can't use it. Only old macbook Pro With DVD Drive can be used.[Lenovo] U41 / U31 / M41 / S41 / K41 / Ideapad / Flex3 / rescuer r720.
You need to buy another kind of Security Lock with a glue-on locking mount if you have this above-mentioned devices.
All Security Locks come with a 18 months warranty against manufacturing defect.
